title: Silver 3 All-Rounder Looking for Ranked Team
body: Looking for a ranked team that plays nearly every day. Add me if you want to ask questions. I have extensive ranked 5's experience playing both with and against diamond/plat soloq ranked players. End goal is OPL.

replies.body:
Ahaha what? Silver 3 to OPL? Aim high I guess. ;)

I'm a support and jungle main. I'd like to sub for those roles if possible. I'm not ready for everyday commitment, but I'd definitely be interested in subbing.

Mid {{champion:157}}  and support {{champion:12}} main, I can substitute (though I prefer not) to any other lane. I work as a team and for my team (or attempt to). 
Still learning new champions, but I pick up very quickly. Would love to dream about OPL but I very much believe that is a goal set for the very distant future.
IGN - AllGudNamesRGone
JG main , count me in , maybe not everyday but will be playing alot,and opl ... too far from it lol
